Suspicious scanning activity targeting o.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log for connection attempts to multiple IPs within owned external ranges from a single source IP over a short period. Identify source IPs with a high number of failed connections or connections to a wide range of ports. Use frequency analysis and thresholding to identify potential scanning sources.

Network probes or unusual traffic patter.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log and dpd.log for unusual connection patterns or protocol detections on external-facing IPs. Identify connections attempting unexpected protocols on standard service ports or connections to less common ports within the external range. Use statistical analysis (e.g., entropy) on destination port distribution per source IP to identify reconnaissance probes vs. legitimate traffic.
